video_prompt: Couple progresses along a winding path through an enchanted forest. Light intensifies ahead, drawing them onward. Trees subtly shift, their gnarled branches and leaves' hues transforming from warm autumnal tones to a misty green in the distance, suggesting a passage of time or space.
image_prompt: Dreamlike, vertical shot of a couple walking on a winding, light brown path through an enchanted forest. Tall, gnarled trees form a tunnel archway, with visible roots and moss. Foreground trees have painterly, reddish-golden leaves curving upwards like an opening curtain, while background leaves are misty green. Bright light emanates from the path's end, suggesting a fantastical, mystical journey.
refined_video_prompt: A couple progresses forward, their steps carrying them along a visually winding path. Ahead, light intensely brightens, subtly pulling their motion. Trees gently sway, their gnarled branches and leaves visibly transforming. Rich autumnal hues fluidly transition to a misty, ethereal green in the distance. The entire environment subtly shifts and evolves as they traverse, suggesting a passage through altering time or space.
